name: DeathFall
description:
This is my first full game. 
DeathFall is a Metroid-vania style platformer. You have one life to get through one level. Make yourself whole again to reach the finish.

W-A-S-D 
Space to jump

L-Mouse to attack
R- Mouse to cast

Can you reach the end?

This game has already received 2 patches. Hope it makes the experience better!!

**Patch Notes**

Prevented the enemy sounds from playing on loop indefinitely

Gave functionality to the Mage Hand Cast(it now does damage and can interact with buttons on the map)
